meanings.definition: A print made using the serigraphy process.
meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful serigraphies of a sunset at the art fair.
meanings.sent2: The gallery featured a collection of serigraphies by local artists.
meanings.sent3: The serigraphies of cartoon characters made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with colorful serigraphies that brightened the space.
meanings.sent5: The serigraphies of flowers looked so realistic, I almost tried to smell them.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of making serigraphs.
meanings.sent1: Learning about serigraphies in art class was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The museum hosted a workshop on the history of serigraphies.
meanings.sent3: The artist's unique approach to serigraphies was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent4: His mastery of serigraphies was evident in every piece he created.
meanings.sent5: The serigraphies workshop taught us how to create stunning prints.
